meanings.sent1: The plain white wall was nondistinctive among the colorful paintings.
meanings.sent2: Her nondistinctive voice made it hard to pick her out in the choir.
meanings.sent3: The nondistinctive rock tried to hide among the shiny gems.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of faces, his nondistinctive features faded into the background.
meanings.sent5: The nondistinctive smell of the room was a mix of various scents.

meanings.definition: Not standing out or easily recognizable.
meanings.sent1: The nondistinctive car in the parking lot was hard to find.
meanings.sent2: His nondistinctive outfit blended in with the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The nondistinctive cat thought it could sneak past unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: Among the stars, the nondistinctive one was easily overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The nondistinctive sound of the wind rustling the leaves was calming.

meanings.sent1: The nondistinctive bird's feathers matched the tree bark perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The nondistinctive building seemed to disappear into the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The nondistinctive chameleon thought it was invisible on the green leaf.
meanings.sent4: Like a chameleon, she was nondistinctive in any social group.
meanings.sent5: The nondistinctive scent of the flower attracted bees without notice.
